gov.fnal.ppd.signage.channel

Class ChannelPlayList

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.fnal.ppd.signage.channel.ChannelPlayList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Channel, SignageContent, Serializable

    public class ChannelPlayList
extends Object
implements Channel
    This class holds a list of Channels that are to be played on a Display
    Author:
    Elliott McCrory, Fermilab AD/Instrumentation
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChannelPlayList

        public ChannelPlayList(List<SignageContent> list,
               long millisecondDwellTime)
        Create a channel list to play out on the Display.
        Parameters:
        list - - The list of channels to play (must be 2 or greater)
        millisecondDwellTime - - How long to wait on each channel (must be 5 seconds or longer)

      • setCode

        public void setCode(int n)
        Description copied from interface: SignageContent
        Gives the Content an attribute that can be interpreted in a number of ways. Initially, this code is either 0 or 1; 0 means show the URL in the normal way; 1 means show the URL in a wrapper web page, which (presumably) has color and Display number information on it, somehow.
        Specified by:
        setCode in interface SignageContent
        Parameters:
        n - The new user-defined code
